name: Trust No one (Crayzato Maximus)
description:
In this game, there isn't anything that is as it seems. There is no one you can trust. Dodge around bugs, on the air and in the sky. Keep going right, and might just reach the end. 

But watch out, This game isn't as it first appears, and you may find yourself going down the wrong path.

Controls - 

       r - restart

      space - progress subtitles ( repeat until no subtitles appear)

      ctrl + q - exit

      the rest are provided by the narator

This was made for the first game jam I've participated, the benbonk game jam # 1
